Enumeration Type Documentation

enum flm_error
Enumerator:
FLM_ERR_ERRNO 

System error, you should take a look at errno.

FLM_ERR_NOMEM 

No more memory available.

FLM_ERR_NOSYS 

The needed syscalls are not avaible on your system

FLM_ERR_BUG 

A bug was discovered, it would be very nice of you to send a report :)

Function Documentation

int flm_Error ( void  )

Return last error code.

All error codes are defined in the documentation. The error code depends on the last operation performed, note that the function is fully threadsafe and use per-thread variable.

Returns:
The last error code, this function itself cannot fail.
Examples:
Buffer unit tests, and Monitor unit tests.
